episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" features four guest comedians sharing intriguing facts. Topics include a record-breaking jigsaw puzzle completion, a medieval pig trial, the composition of emotional tears, and Jimi Hendrix's unexpected tour with The Monkees.

facts.fact: At the 2020 British Puzzle Championship, Sarah Mills solved a 1000 piece jigsaw puzzle in one hour and 40 minutes.
In 1386, a pig was put on trial for murder.
Emotional tears have more protein in them, so they fall slow, and it's by design so that our tribe can see us cry and comfort us.
In 1967, for eight dates, Jimi Hendrix supported the Monkees on tour in the United States of America.
